definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Using percent signs within variable names is not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 不允許在變量名內部使用百分號。

sentences.english: Less than 40 per cent of businesses bother to check academic and professional qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 不足40百分號的企業會費心覈查教育和職業資歷。

sentences.english: Take out percent sign, move decimal points two places to the left.
sentences.chinese: 去掉百分號，小數點向左移動兩位。
